title: Graphical Glitch with Udyr
body:
happened on first fight, Udyr went in, died and then this happened. This is what I was seeing all game except when he died. 

This was seen just by me. 
Current Mac Client.

replies.body: Thanks for the report! We've gone ahead and [disabled](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) the skin as we work on a fix!
